Carpentry chest
Type: Container

The sublime details on this crate you found while going through your carpentry supplies indicate that it was crafted by a master carpenter.

Carpentry chest is an openable treasury item. It can drop while doing Carpentry activities, and can be obtained from some other sources. These Chests are the only way to obtain some Carpentry based Equipment. They can have the odds of finding them increased with the Chest Finding equipment attribute.

Loot Tables

These are the sub-tables for the various materials, coins, and items that can come from these chests.

These treasury items take 4 independent loot rolls when they are opened.
